title: How to see & stop my GPS location from being tracked by my Ex-bf who got my IMEI# off my phone box?
content:
I'm hypervigilant with any links or unknown contacts, sources bc my Ex has been trying to hack my phone for years. He has managed to atleast track my GPS location and knows every move I make. He got my phone box somehow which I remembered has the IMEI# on it so I'm assuming that's how he's tracking me. 
Any help would be so appreciated!
Or should I just come up with the $ to buy a new phone?
Below is his hotels business office WiFi showing up on MY phone and I've never stepped foot in that place!
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
